title: E90 High Quality Demonic Excitement and a Serial Killer Crossover
description:
Shout out to all our suspiciously beautiful listeners out there because you just might be a witch! This pre-Halloween spooky season Em brings us the history of Bloody Mary and answers the burning, eternal question, "Do little girls conjure demons?" and, spoiler alert, the answer is a resounding "yes". Meanwhile, Christine digs into the story of the dollar store Jack the Ripper, Joel Rifkin, aka Joel the Ripper. And we make plans for our upcoming live show in King Tut's Tomb, promo code: EGYPT... and that's why we drink!
Please consider supporting the companies that support us! 
Get a free trial membership of Beach Body On Demand when you text DRINK to 303030
Try a 2-month VIP membership with Grove, plus a bonus gift, when you go to grove.co/drink
Try ZipRecruiter, the smarter way to hire, for free at ziprecruiter.com/drink
Attention cat owners! Get 20% off your first order at PrettyLitter.com promo code DRINK.
